Corruption is at the core of ALL that damages this world, be it Russia, the US (!), religion. Fighting it is everything.

name: Bill Browder

name: Bill Browder

name: Bill Browder
text: @Billbrowder Once starting 'Red Notice' - was afraid to pick it up again because I couldn't put it down. Your writing talents rank up there with investor & activist. MOST importantly for me, Sergei Magnitsky is now much more than a just a name behind important legislation.

name: Bill Browder

name: Bill Browder
text: Global Magnitsky Act - a great instrument in foreign policy towards more (international) accountability and less impunity. If used systematically a potentially great deterrent against human rights violations. We need this in the EU asap.//t.co/kmmFlndSWJ

name: Bill Browder
text: @Billbrowder @3mendous Congratulations Bill. Well deserved. You defied all predictions and achieved the near impossible in international relations by your sheer perseverance and dedication to justice.

name: Bill Browder
text: Well deserved, Bill! Here is to one day presenting you with an award in Moscow for your work in creating a freer and more democratic world.//t.co/LfUbMTBU6K

name: Bill Browder

name: Bill Browder

name: Bill Browder
text: On February 7th, I finished Red Notice by Bill Browder (@Billbrowder). This was far and away one of the best books I have EVER read. Bill, thank you for telling Sergei's story with the passion that you have - he would be proud. 5 , and I will definitely read again and again.//t.co/Wba1jcXQYk

name: Bill Browder

name: Bill Browder
text: I wish I could personally bitch slap everyone who continues to twist the facts of his horrific death in order to kiss up to the Russian president and his lackeys. You people are trash. Sergei chose death over dishonor. Something the cowards at RT will never understand.

name: Bill Browder
text: Sergei Magnitsky was an honorable man who died a horrific, torturous death. His agony lasted for over an hour. He was in handcuffs as he died. He was posthumously convicted by a justice system that exists only to serve the interests of a tiny group of elite ghouls.

name: Bill Browder
text: Even the (highly cynical and unethical) doctors at the jail admitted what he died of - he was ill and was being denied medical treatment in a calculated attempt to force him to cooperate with investigators. Hell, I've spoken to one of the nurses myself. RT is filthy garbage.//t.co/zDC0hgI0J1

name: Bill Browder

name: Bill Browder
text: @Billbrowder Finally got my copy of Red Notice. Began reading it whilst queuing to pay for it. 3 mugs of coffee & 6 chapters later I realized I had missed my bus home. Absolutely riveting, utterly un-putdownable.

name: Bill Browder

name: Bill Browder

name: Bill Browder
text: Today (Sept 3rd) is the deadline for the Dutch government to propose a Dutch Magnitsky Act if they couldn't secure an EU wide Magnitsky Act. A majority of the Dutch parliament voted for this on April 3rd. We are waiting for the announcement.

name: Bill Browder
text: @Billbrowder Red Notice is absolutely my #1 purchase this year. Going to be a great gift to give out. The progression of your business and activism in your investments and human rights is inspiring. Really looking forward to the portrayal of Edmond Safra in the movie! (please)

text: @Billbrowder Red Notice is the first book I have ever read and become emotionally involved with the author. It was because I have you on tweet alert that I was able to mobilise my little corner of the Twittersphere when you were arrested in Spain. You're one of the family.

name: Bill Browder
text: BREAKING: Anastasia and Irina Bitkov have been released from Guatemalan prison to be reunited with their family. The family still awaits full exoneration because CICIG has filed a motion against the Constitutional Court decision in the family's favor.

name: Bill Browder

name: Bill Browder
text: Welcome to the club! I'm just amazed that it took them so long.//t.co/pB7bGvlyFA

name: Bill Browder
text: Update on the Bitkov hearing in Guatemala. FECI-the Attorney's General Office supported release of Irina and Anastasia, stating that no criminal offenses were committed. PGN State Prosecutors supported Irina and Anastasia's release. CICIG opposed. Hearing adjourned until 3pm.//t.co/UXXw9vOkis

text: Anastasia Bitkov is remarkably dignified and composed given the terrible ordeal she's been subjected to by the Russians and their partners in the Guatemalan justice system//t.co/7eGLtglO6w

name: Bill Browder
text: @stevemiller999 Anastasia Bitkov was sentenced to 14 years in jail for passport violations' at the request of Russia and with the full complicity and support of U.N. organization CICIG. She's not well and this is an abomination that she's spent a single minute in jail. She's done nothing wrong

name: Bill Browder
text: @stevemiller999 Anastasia Bitkov was sentenced to 14 years in jail for passport violations' at the request of Russia and with the full complicity and support of U.N. organization CICIG. name: Bill Browder

name: Bill Browder
text: On the day the UK Magnitsky Act was given Royal Assent, the Ukraine Magnitsky Act gets traction in the Ukrainian parliament. Stay tuned for more progress, hopefully next week.//t.co/OnU2YpBrE2

name: Bill Browder
text: V. Kara-Murza: Vilnius City Council has just decided to name the square in front of the Russian embassy after Boris Nemtsov: 32 votes in favour, 1 against, 1 abstention. name: Bill Browder
text: Very pleased with the reception I got at the Dutch parliament today advocating for a Magnitsky Act. Based on the instructions of parliament, the Dutch government has until September 3rd to create an EU wide Magnitsky Act. Otherwise they are obliged to introduce Dutch legislation//t.co/2iVyn4SFca

name: Bill Browder
text: Today the Sanctions and Money Laundering Bill gets Royal Assent and becomes an Act. The full Magnitsky provisions are now in law. Congratulations to @Billbrowder and others who campaigned so hard for this

name: Bill Browder
text: 2nd day of business at @PACE_LegalHR. Much discussion on money laundering, Sergei Magnitsky & the great work of @Billbrowder. Fascinating presentation from @SenAndreychuk on her part in getting legislation passed in Canada, Like the UK, cross party working was key.//t.co/jGcLbcUJmp

name: Bill Browder
text: For Dutch speakers, in advance of my testimony in the Dutch parliament, my oped on why there should be a Dutch Magnitsky Act. I also raise the perplexing question of why the VVD (the government party) would vote against a law banning torturers & murderers//t.co/DiNXweIAAG

name: Bill Browder
text: Important stuff. Hopefully @Billbrowder will be able to convince the objecting MP's, concerning mostly the @VVD party.//t.co/NVQel1edUn//t.co/NVQel1edUn

name: Bill Browder
text: @Billbrowder Royal Assent for your courage Sergei. You didn't die in vain. Congratulations to Bill, the team and the Magnitsky family. You all deserve to bask in this extraordinary day.

name: Bill Browder
text: The UK Magnitsky Amendment should be receiving Royal Assent today. The first thing the British government should do is sanction the people who tortured and killed Sergei Magnitsky. We waited 8 years for this. Justice demands it. //t.co/SKqLgsYiVs

name: Bill Browder

name: Bill Browder
text: @Billbrowder The result of incredible passion and effectiveness. Very few examples of someone with a mission and the cerebral, physical, networking resources to bring Governments to book in this way. A lesson borne from tragedy.

name: Bill Browder
text: @Billbrowder Congratulations, Bill. This is also a major blow to the laundering of profits from numerous illegal activities, including human and drug trafficking. You've done more good than you could possibly know.

name: Bill Browder
text: @Billbrowder Mr. BILL BROWDER is a Gold StarGlobal Citizen and we should aspire to be as effective in changing laws in many countries to fight money laundering on a global scale. He has been threatened, harassed, bullied and more but he keeps on going and breaking barriers. Outstanding!

name: Bill Browder
text: After all the Russian fake news and videos that have been disseminated on Google, the company now is bowing to Putin pressure to block Navalny's Deripaska/model'/Putin official video//t.co/xfUvkKVsmE

name: Bill Browder
text: A Canadian environmentalist dies' in an Iranian prison. The authorities refuse the family's demand for an autopsy. Very strong echoes of Sergei Magnitsky. Straight out of the despots playbook. I hope the Canadian gov't is ready to play hardball here//t.co/YQGo7viWx2

name: Bill Browder
text: U.K. lawyers now advising their clients to steer clear of doing business with foreign human rights abusers to avoid having their assets confiscated by the British government //t.co/BG9RkIDcrZ

name: Bill Browder
text: Unilever threatens to pull ad dollars from Google and Facebook because of the proliferation of fake news and inappropriate content. Since the gov't hasn't done anything, good to see private sector step up//t.co/H59DcnvAAx
